com.lukflug.panelstudio.theme

Interface ITheme

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IThemeMultiplexer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClearTheme, GameSenseTheme, ImpactTheme, OptimizedTheme, RainbowTheme, ThemeBase, Windows31Theme

    public interface ITheme
    Interface representing a GUI theme (i.e. skin).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The constant for a small button with a "+".
